values:
Mom,

PLEASE stop spamming my LJ, plzkthx.

~Coral

Bleh, been hacking my lungs out all day. XD; Nep and Zeth went home today -- turns out poor Nep might've caught whatever I had. (I'm sorry mama!) Apparently it's something that's been going around the school though. Practically half my economics class was coughing. XD; McMullen ended up leaving the room because it was 'like an infirmary' in there.

So yeah. Good visit with Nep an' Zeth. We saw Star Wars which was very yay. I'll prolly comment on it behind an lj-cut later. But right now, Coral needs some sleep. Damn germs. x.x

Welp, I said I would, and I have: I made a Question/Huntress colorbar. Or rather, seven. XD; I couldn't decide how I wanted it to look, so I ended up making seven or them with teeny variations and ended up not being able to pick which one I wanted to stick in here for sure. If anyone thinks one looks better than the rest, feel free to let me know for future reference. XD; And...um, yeah. Colorbars. Huzzah.

It's okay Deanner. I still like you. XD;

Wow. I'm getting some good use outta my LJ today. Go me. XD a. Post a list of 10 fandoms. b. Have your friends list choose a character from each fandom that he/she thinks most resembles you and justify why. c. Post in your own LJ, if you're a memewhore too. Or ignore. Your choice. 1) Fullmetal Alchemist 2) Wolf's Rain 3) Inuyasha 4) Gargoyles 5) Justice League (Which probably won't really get any responses seeing as I bet no one on my friendslist watches it. n_n;) 6) Weiss Kreuz (Which I just realized I forgot on my last meme. D'oh.) 7) DBZ 8) Final Fantasy VII 9) Yu Yu Hakusho 10) Beast Wars (... Wait, odds are no one watches that either. u_u;;) Erm, make that Ushio & Tora.

Swiped from Natalie (*too lazy to go find the username linkie thing*) 1) Post a list of 10 fandoms/shows you follow (current or cancelled!) 2) Have your friends list guess your favorite CHARACTER from each show. 3) When guessed, bold the line and write a sentence about why you like that character. 4) Post in your own livejournal. Erm, just a note right here. In just about all of my fandoms, I have multiple favorite characters and can't just settle on one no matter how hard I try. ^^; So...I'll just put a number beside it to show how many there are to be guessed. Sound fair? (Yes, it's cheating, but I honestly can't pick just one. ^^; Technically I've got a bunch more for each, but I'm only listing my top favorites here. How sad is that?) 1.) Justice League/Justice League Unlimited - (1) 2.) Gargoyles - (2) 3.) Inuyasha - (5 -- yes, 5, shush) 4.) Fullmetal Alchemist - (4) 5.) Dragonball Z - Piccolo. n_n Why? Because I have this thing for serious bald green aliens with antennae and cloaks and turbans and -- well, you get the idea. He was my second anime 'male' (considering he's asexual and technically not male...but meh, technicalities) obsession, shortly following Tora. I don't care what some people might say about the Dragonball series; Piccolo in general pwns. The end. 7.) Final Fantasy VII - (1 down; 2 to go) Vincent Valentine - He's teh angst, he's teh smex, he's teh Vincent! Natalie may bop me for it, but I wubs my Vincent. <3 8.) Wolf's Rain - (4) 9.) Ushio & Tora - Tora. I mean, comon'. He's a kick-ass tiger demon who's unintentionally hilarious half the time. There's nothing NOT to love about this guy. Plus his character design is bloody awesome. X3 10.) Slayers - (3)

Figures. I'm barely over being sick as a dog, Mom doesn't want me walking to school, so she calls a cab. I can't be absent/late anymore, so naturally, the cab is late. >.<; 15 minutes late encounting. *headdesk*

Excerpt from the LE chat. XD SN's changed to protect the not-so-innocent.

Mistie: OMG... in the fekking news broadcast today there was a report on two suicide bombers killing some israeli troops .... then the newscaster mentions that the bombers died as well... 
Me: ...oh man. XD;
Mistie: and I'm sitting there thinking , they woudln't be called suicide bombers if they fekking lived, now would they?
Jimi: ^_^;;
Jimi: Sure they would. bad ones.
Mistie: *sighs* has the american IQ dropped so low that we have to be told that suicide bombers died in thier attack ?
Jimi: "... I survived!? O_o... well.. crap.. u_u;;"
Me: XD
Lich: XD
Me: 'wait, lemme try that again...o_o i'll get it this time!'
Jimi: XD
Jimi: "WHAT!? Again!? What am i!? Superman? >_<"
Me: XD!
Jimi: "...third times a charm..."
Lich: XD
Jimi: "....FINE! I give up. I'm just gonna be a REGULAR bomber. This trying to die is jsut too har--*falls down the stairs of the hospital n breaks his neck*"
Me: XD!!
Lich: XD
Lich: lol
Me: that does it, this whole thing's going in my LJ. XD
Jimi: XD Cool

Y'know, it's funny. Now that I have all these lovely friends on here, a lovely paid account and a lovely fifty icons and a lovely mood theme, I haven't really used 'em much at all. ^^; I keep meaning to go and try to see if I can manage to make a layout for myself, but of course I haven't gotten to.

I promise I'll make a useful update soon about stuff regarding life and I'll make some journal comments while I'm on it. Really. Just wait and see. It's Friday, it's gunna be a weekend soon. While I'm at it, I really oughta post for LE. But now the bell rang, so I gotta go. Laters. x.x

In science, five minutes left, on a Friday. x.x Snuck on the computer for curent events, did it already, and now I'm bored. Probably could go read my book or summat, but I'm not in the mood at the moment. So here I am typing. Yup, because even if I'm not in the mood to read, I'm in the mood to type apparently. Go fig.

FARFIGNEUTON!

<form action="http://www.corknut.org/toys/pizza/" method="get">Want to find out what pizza you and I can share? Put your name in the box next to mine and click the button to find out! <input type="text" name="others" size="26" value="hanakirei85, "><input type="submit" value="Mmm, pizza!"></form>

Put in your name after mine and see what pizza we get. =3 Comon', you know you wanna.

Meh, I feel bad that I haven't been responding to people's entries or been keeping much up to date at all, but  between school, trying to pick out a college, and some LE and Gaia on the side to keep myself relatively sane, I've been like...dead. XD; It wouldn't be as much of an issue with the college bit if my GPA wasn't so bad and my SAT scores weren't so relatively well-off. My guidance counseler is trying for the E.O.P. thing, but apparently my SAT score is sort of over-qualifying me. So yeah. Been working on that stuff pretty hard for the past month. And in spite of all my work in school, I'm still failing stuff for "not completing homework". x.x Dude, I've been DOING the homework. I missed one or two of them. Does that really merit a 50-something? GRAH! Well on the brighter side, at least I should finally be able to send out some college applications this week. Hoping for the best on that. (Sort of funny since I was perfectly fine with going to a two-year community college with a dorm to boost my grades up, but Kim and the counseler are pushing for a four-year SUNY school right from the get-go. Meh, whatever. So long as it has classes I wanna take, y'know?)

So yeah. @.@; Just generally apologizing to everyone for being sort of distant. *apologizes sparatically*

HOLY CRAP I'M A LOSER. XD; I can't sleep, so I'm sitting here, still poking around Gaia, innocently reading the threads as I'm half-asleep...and all of a sudden, something comes floating up and scares the living crap outta me. Turned out to be an enchanted chest. XD;; Gah, I swear it nearly gave me a heart attack.

Yeah. XD; I finally started going to the FMAdub chat on AIM. What happens? I die and end up bought back as a homonculus. But not just any homonculus. I am the second in a series of crack sins, PINE! Yes, I realize the vast majority of you are probably going 'WTF?' right now, but for those of you wondering, here's the entire list of crack sins and who they correspond to, swiped from Spleen's entry on it. XD; I luff you Spleen!

Gluttony = Buttony
Pride = Pine
Lust = Gust
Sloth = Goth
Anger/Wrath = Angel
Envy = Navy
Greed = Spleen

Now we've got a whole bunch more, too. o_o Butt Sex, Spastic Gerbil, Angsty Uke, Pants...the list just keeps growing. XD I love this fandom.

Meh, haven't written here in awhile, have I? Sorry all. Been a bit preoccupied. Long story, not getting into it. Thus far, all my classes are looking as though I'm gunna pass, so yay. Only one I'm really worried about is English. Probably going to see a doctor on Thursday since it seems I finally got some insurance (whee!) and that cyst has hurting again (erm...much less of a yay). Here's hoping it either stops soon, or the doctor can do something about it. 'Till then, just loading up on painkillers.

To everyone on my friends list, big hugs and much love for you all. 'Specially all my WHB friends. *super-uber-glomps*

That is all. G'night all.

How is it that even when I have fifty icons, I still have issues picking which ones I'm going to use? Meh. o.o Anyway.

Took the SATs. Ended up leaving four math questions blank - hoping that isn't so bad. No idea how bad/well I might've done, but I'll know in a little less than two weeks. If I do do relatively well, maybe I'll just skip those Decemver SATs I'm registered for. Fingers crossed, ne? Already lost one Saturday morning to that thing.

Randomly here, has anyone been watching that show 'Drawn Together' on Comedy Central? I'm loving it so far. Crude as all hell, even offensive, but it's still hilarious. Parodies all the best cartoons. X3 Even Betty Boop.

Meh...I really oughta make myself a nifty pretty LJ layout soon, if I can figure out how to do it. Most I've been able to do to it so far is stick little FMA references into the comment things and junk. *makes a note to work on that*
...I have never wanted to move to Canada as badly as I do right now. >.<;
Nights like these...Gaia makes me want to smack my head into something. Repeatedly. x.x And here I thought the Olympics were bad.

Bleh...this is not shaping up to be a good morning so far. O.o Not omly did I wake up late since the alarm hasn't really been doing too well at getting me up, but my shower also took longer than it should have. Meaning I'm even more late. So the way I'm figuring it...I'm going to be late in any case. It's pouring rain outside and I'm about to walk to school without an umbrella. I can afford to sit down for a few minutes and eat my breakfast. >.> And I think I just heard thunder.
I really oughta go do some laundry. Again.

I think I might wanna be a demon kitty for Halloween. The only problem is, if I get everything I want for the costume, it'd cost like...at least $160.

...

*grumble*
Owwww...>.o; How the hell did I manage to get my hair stuck in the blowdryer?? Bleh... Great way to start the day.

Well, that was freaky. I was just lying in my bed, about to go to sleep, my eyes shut, when I felt someone hit the back of my shoulder. Not once, but twice. I whipped my eyes open to see if it was Mom or what, but nobody was there.

*shudder* And I thought the handstreaks on the steamed-up mirrors were creepy. X.x

Well, today was filled with a random series of events. o.o First off, I took a cab to school today since I had to work on something this morning and I would've been uber-late instead of a little late if I had walked. So I had some money left over on me, which I planned fully on handing over to Mom when I got home.

Them fifth period rolled around. I'd eaten breakfast, I hadn't walked, and I usually manage fine with skipping lunch...but today for some reason, I was just unbearably hungry. I meant to go to the library like I usually do, but I was just too hungry, so I decided 'what the heck, I'll get the school's crappy food for once'. Coincidence #1: There happened to be a bakesale going on. There have been two others going on before this one (a week ago, etc.), and they'd both ended up making me crave a cupcake or something sweet more than anything. So, I finally got my cupcake, and bought a rice krispy's treat for Mom. Poddled on into the caferia, found out (Coincidence #2) that my free lunch thing from last year is still valid. So lunch itself was free. o.o w00t.

So I was sitting at a table by myself, just merrily gnawshing away at lunch and my cupcake, reading volume one of Chobits again while I was at it. All of a sudden, this guy just plops down across from me, doesn't say a word, and just starts eating. So I essentially went "Umm...okay...o.o" and went back to reading without thinking much of it. Then a girl comes over, and starts talking to the guy. Then she started talking to me. Turns out the guy is uber-shy, and doesn't have too many friends, so she declared one day that she'd be his friend too. Then she spotted the Chobits manga. Which it turns out she's read about three times. XD; Yes, Coincidence #3: Somehow I ended up running into a fellow anime freak. So by the end of the period I ended up as a table full of nice-type people. XD;;; As in nicer than most of the people I've run into so far. One of 'em even caught sight of me when I was heading out of school at the end of the day and wished me a good weekend.

Funny thing is, I can't remember if that girl told me her name or not. ^^;;

Welp, officially less than 45 minutes left of birthday to go. o.o Being 19 doesn't feel any different from being 18, but I guess that shouldn't be too much of a surprise considering turning 18 never actually felt all that different from 17. Pretty quiet day, overall. I might have actually found some nice people at Bayport. o.o Not getting my hopes up too high, but...

Though I think the gym teacher insulted me indirectly today, but we won't go into that. >.>;

Now I just gotta figure out what I want to dress up as on Halloween. o.o Probably won't go Trick-or-Treating since there'll be no one to go with, but I'd like to dress up anywho. Especially since there's a bunch of kids running around here. If I had more money, I'd try cosplaying as Greed...but not many people are really going to know who he is until November anyway.
